gobblin.hive.policy

Interface HiveRegistrationPolicy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HiveRegistrationPolicyBase, HiveSnapshotRegistrationPolicy

    @Alpha
public interface HiveRegistrationPolicy
    An interface for generating a HiveSpec for a Path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<HiveSpec> getHiveSpecs(Path path)
      Get a collection of HiveSpecs for a Path, which can be used by HiveRegister to register the given Path.

    • Method Detail
